EmailTemplate.description: Template for New Case Comments Added to Case.
EmailTemplate.name: Case Comments Added
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Comment Has Been Added To Your Case# {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Street__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for submitting your request. Please be advised that Case # {!Case.CaseNumber} regarding "{!Case.RecordType}" located at {!Case.Street__c} has been Closed by the "{!Case.Department__c}".
The {!Case.Department__c} has left a comment on your case: "{!Case.Last_Case_Comment}".
You may track the status of your request using the case number provided via our website at http://www.phila.gov/311/pages/default.aspx, or reply to this email, dial 3-1-1, or for outside of Philadelphia please dial 215-686-8686. Please note updates to the website may take up to 48 hours to appear.
Regards, Philly311 Customer Support
